alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 3:24PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Eagle, northwestern Pitkin and southeastern Garfield Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 324 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Glenwood Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Carbondale around 340 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Basalt. This includes the following highways... Colorado 82 between mile markers 1 and 19. Colorado 133 between mile markers 63 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys
